S

setAutoPrint(boolean) - Method in class at.mukprojects.console.Console
If this flag is set to true, the Console will also be printed to the default system out.
setCutMove(boolean) - Method in class at.mukprojects.console.Console
If this flag is set to true, the console will cut log entries which include the String "__MOVE__".
setTimestamp(boolean) - Method in class at.mukprojects.console.Console
If timestamp is set to true, the console will add a timestamp to every log entry.
start() - Method in class at.mukprojects.console.Console
Starts the console.
